title: Blake Lively and Justin Baldoni's Movie Fight
summary: Blake Lively and Justin Baldoni are actors who worked together on a movie called It Ends With Us. They are now in a big argument in court. Blake says Justin did bad things to her, like sexual harassment, and Justin says that is not true. New messages from Blake show she called Justin names like 'clown' and 'doofus director' in texts to her friends. She also said she felt sorry for him even though he was mean to her. The messages are part of a lawsuit, and the case will go to trial in May. Both sides have different stories, and the court will decide what really happened.

keywords.explanation: a legal case where people go to court to solve a problem
when someone does or says unwanted things that make another person feel uncomfortable or unsafe
written notes sent on phones between people
a meeting in court where a judge listens to both sides and makes a decision

background_read: Blake Lively and Justin Baldoni are famous actors in Hollywood. They starred in a movie together, but now they are having a big fight in court. Blake says Justin did bad things, and Justin says that is not true. The court will look at messages they sent to friends to help decide who is telling the truth. This shows how celebrities sometimes have disagreements that end up in legal battles.
Article_Structure: WHO: Blake Lively and Justin Baldoni, actors in a movie
WHAT: A lawsuit where Blake accuses Justin of sexual harassment, and they argue in court with text messages as evidence
WHERE: In a court in the United States
WHY: To resolve their conflict and decide if Justin did bad things to Blake

perspectives.description: She feels hurt and says Justin harassed her, so she is taking him to court to stop it.
He denies doing anything wrong and is defending himself in the lawsuit.
